# Value.From method

Gets an instance of [`Value`](../Value.md) from the given *value*.

```csharp
public static Value From(object value)
```

## Return Value

An instance of [`Value`](../Value.md) if the cast is successful.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| NotSupportedException | The given *value* has a type which cannot be parsed as a [`Value`](../Value.md). |
